name: Paid Games
title: Premium Gaming Experience
description: Explore a collection of premium video games for purchase. Enjoy high-quality graphics and immersive gameplay.

name: Free Game
title: Free-to-Play Games
description: Discover a selection of free-to-play video games. Enjoy gaming without any upfront costs.

name: Battle Royale
title: Battle Royale Experience
description: Experience intense battle royale action in various multiplayer games. Compete to be the last player or team standing.

name: Sports
title: Sports Gaming Extravaganza
description: Play your favorite sports virtually. Enjoy realistic gameplay and compete against friends or AI opponents.

name: Racing Games
title: High-Speed Racing Thrills
description: Rev up your engines and race against opponents in exciting racing video games. Choose your favorite cars and tracks.

name: Open World Games
title: Explore Vast Open Worlds
description: Dive into vast open worlds filled with exploration and adventure. Embark on epic journeys and uncover hidden secrets.
